credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at R.H. Macy & Co.
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem satin, knot, chain, eye, four-sided canvas, rococo, herringbone, and half cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Two alphabets at the top (missing the letter J) divided by narrow bands of pattern, then a rococo frame enclosing scattered flowers and the inscription: Vivat MD WD, with initials and animal figures at the sides.
name: Sampler
